meanings.definition: A plant of the bedstraw family with small white flowers.
meanings.sent1: The woodruff in the garden has delicate white flowers.
meanings.sent2: I spotted some woodruff growing by the fence.
meanings.sent3: The woodruff seemed to be whispering secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The woodruff stood out like a tiny dancer in the sea of green.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the woodruff filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: A sweet-smelling herb used in flavoring drinks and desserts.
meanings.sent1: She added a sprinkle of woodruff to the lemonade for a special touch.
meanings.sent2: The woodruff gave the dessert a unique and pleasant aroma.
meanings.sent3: The woodruff herb winked mischievously from the spice rack.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as refreshing as a breeze carrying the scent of woodruff.
meanings.sent5: The woodruff infused the drink with a hint of magic.
